name: Giant Mana Cake
originalText:
2 — When this permanent leaves the battlefield, create two Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}: You gain 3 life.")

text:
{TK}{TK} — When this permanent leaves the battlefield, create two Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
{TK}{TK}{TK}{TK} — When this permanent dies, destroy target nonland permanent.
{TK}{TK} — 3/3
{TK}{TK}{TK} — 6/2
